name: Burrow (xonic)
description: Hello! This is my first game jam ever! I think I did alright (at least I got sleep)  My game is burrow. A platformer all about escaping your bunker in a post apocalyptic world.  Controls:  WAD- Move Alt+f4 - end game  Touch the furnaces to restore the power of the facility. Power is indicated by the battery in the top left corner.  Thanks for checking out my project <3
